entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow or periods of ice pellets overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 7:53 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:53 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
